div.head:
Thir ar' the personis that
nicholes werk the
div.p:
Alexander menyes aldirman of Abirdene
werk eftir the tenour of th
wif tua barrelis Salmond' eftir the tenor
barrel salmonde to be deliuerit
Dauy menyeis j barrel Salmond
Salmonde gilbert menyes j barrel

ane amercia-
ment of ma-
Johow

at his forspekar' fol
aw how mekle' he suld
salmond sauld to gilbert

the ros' nobile xxxv s' harj nobile xxxj s' Angell xxiij s' iiij d
scottis the rider' xxiij s' / vnicorne xviij s' the demy xiij s' iiij d' / the scottis ro
the Sidcott lyone xviij s' / the lichtlione x s' / the ald' franche crone xiiij s' the
of the Some xiiij s' vj d' the Rall of franche xv s' vj d' the lew xvij s' vj d'
nobile xxxtj s' the Ridar' of flandris xv s' / the gudling of Sanct Androw
Rinsche gudlingis x s' vj d' / the postulat gudlingis iij s' viij d' / the ducat xv
the crovne of bertane xiij s' / the ald' Inglis grot xvj d' / the new
grotis xiiij d' / the ald' crovnit grot xiiij d' / the new crovnit grot / xiiij d' / the
Spurrit grotis xvj d' / the new sprurrit grotis xij d' the flour lys' viii d' / I
viij d' / the ald' plak iiij d' / the demi ald' plak ij d' / the smale d' j ob
penny iij d' / the Inglis penny iij d'

Item it is Statut and ordanit that quhar' ony partj has action and s
vthiris and the defendour compir In propir persone or be his procutoris he sal p
Skatis of the partj condempnit and ane vnlaw of xl s' to the In
dais eftir the decret of deliuerance be gevin thar'apon' or euir he
Jugement And falyeing tharof that lettres be writin to the seref of th
balye of burghe and land' for the execucion of the said decretis
his office and thar' feis xij d' of Ilk barrel say Recouerit to be tak
said' decret happinis to be gevin agan And' gif it b
sereffis and officiaris to falye in thar' office nocht making the p
forme of the kingis lettres within xx dais of sic Some
Recouerit as said is to be Rasit of thar awne propir
or ony vthir officiar' be negligent forsaid' and mak
of the said' decretis And eftir the forme of the lettres
tharupon he that has the office of heretage sal tyne th
And' he that has the samyn in lyfrent sal tyne the samyn foreuirmar'
pay the costis and skatis of the partj And the seref or officiar' to be
tharfor and Rasit apone him or thame to giddir with the presentis some that
And in likuis' the prouest and balyes of burrowis to be secludit fore
office foreuirmar' And to be dettor and pay the said some with costis

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio
die mensis Januarij Anno quosupra

The said the baillies chargeit Johnne' collisoun' to pay xviii s' iiij d' to
ser Andro collisone chaplane betuix this and mononday for the annuell
aucht to the said ser Andro of ane croft quhilk Robert thenydall occupeis

The said day mariory club Ellene club and Katherin club with
thomas lesly thar forspekar and schew how thai war warnit
to comper the samyn day for the serving of ane breif of rycht Impetrat'
be Dauy mar anent ane land' debatable' betuix thaim liand' in
the gallougat offering thame reddy till vnderly in the premiss'
And becaus the said Dauid nor' nane' totheris in his naim comperit
to follou the said breive the said wemen protestit for thar costis and
expensis And the said breyf to haue na passag quhill thai war
lauch'fully warnit tharto

The tuenty day of December the yeir of god jM vc' and' sex yeris
The said day Syme michel oblist him be the faitht of his bodie
to pay to Andro lousoun' xx Nynten' s' vj d' at vphaliday
vnraparuit And' marioun' Red' the Relict' of vmquhile William
lard' oblist hir be the faitht of hir bodie to Releif the sad'
symoun' of the said soum at the said' day
anno Domini millesimo quingentesimo Sexto

oblist him be the faitht of his bodie to content
William Rait fiwe merkis vsuale money of scotland'
sanct pallades day that nixt cumis or one sanct palla-
enit for ane hors' quhilk was deliuerit to Robert
blinseill of cukstoun' And the said Robert oblist him to freitht and'
relef the said' gilbert of the said Some' at the said day

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta
mensis Julij anno quosupra

The saide day the ballieis ordanit Dauid
Dunbrek the xl day lauchfule next hireftir
or ellis to pay William Watson' the thing' com
buk optenit vpon' the saide thomas

Robert Waus lauchfully warnit callit and' nocht comperit fr
at the Instance

tenta in pretorio eiusdem
millesimo quingentensimo quinto

friday that nixt cummis to Johne'
malisoun' set him the hous' quhilk
l paying' vnto the tyme that the
the hous' cum in and duell in the samyn
mensis februarij Anno Domini millesimo quingentesimo quinto

t Watsoun' fecit constituit creauit nominauit et ordinavit
suum verum legitimum et Indubitatum procuratorem dan' et conceden'
aram et omnimodam potestatem et mandatam speciale pro se et nomine suo
end' Dauid Kintor pro vna vacca sibi debit' pro vna Inn pro
Dunbrek promitten' de Rato et grato et cetera cum cetero clausulis
necessariis et oportunis
Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene

div.head: xxij die mensis Augustj
div.p:
Dauid stuart lauchfully callit warnit and nocht
comperit to ansuer to the borgh' fundin one him ??
John murray the balyes chargit n lesly to warn'
the said Dauid to this xv dais as ferd' day of proces'
Curia balliuorum

Curia Capitalis Balliuorum de Abirdene
eiusdem
quarto die mensis Octobris Anno Domini Millesimo quingentestimo
primo quo die sectis vocatis et Curia affirmata absentes patent

Eodem die Alexander Menyheis Electus fuit in Officium pre
positure pro Anno Instanti prestito solito Juramento

Eodem die Thomas leslie Jacobus Collisoun' Johannis mar
et Dauid mar Electi fuerunt in Officium balliuorum pro Anno
Instanti prestitis solitus Juramentis

Eodem die gilbertus menyeis et Andreas Cullane Electj fuerunt
decani gilde pro Anno Instanti prestito solitis Juramentis

Eodem die Willelmus scrimgeour Andreas nachtj gilbertus prestone
et Johannes Cuk Electi fuerunt in officium sergeandorum huius
pr burgj pro Anno Instanti prestitis solitis Juramentis

The said day the Alderman and baillies assignit friday that nixt
cumis georg bisset and Johne Tuliboy in thar wiffis Names to gif
thame and Inquisicioun' of the Court gif thai be nerrest and lauchfull
ayris to vmquhile thomas prat

Eodem die Accedens ad barram Dauid liell procutaror domini Johannis capellanj sancte katherine virgine
striuelinge Et protestatus fuit In prima Juris pro vno annuo Redditu sex solidorum
de terra wasta alexandri chamer in schipraw sibi et dicte capelle annuatim
debit' Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico nauium ex occidentali parte eiusdem vicj
inter terram quondam Robertj Ranison ex australi et terram quondam Richardj
craufurd ex borealj ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile
preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo presentavit in curia tanquam secundo
die huius processus Testibus Andrea meldrum Johanne crukshank et Johanne cuk

aldirman and consal present for the tyme Instance
of forbes in Skene grantit to resaue lame
his seruand' tuechit be the handis of gode with thar'
common hospitalite ordanit for siclik sek fo

Eodem die accedens ad barram venerabilis vir magister Johannes badenaghe
et protestabat in forma Juris pro vno annuo Redditu xiij s' iiij d' vsualis
monete scocie de terra quondam Donaldi sclater in vico inferioris ecclesie
ex australi parte eiudsem inter terram quondam Andree mureson ex orientali Et
terram Alexandri howat ex occidentali dicto magistro Johanni annuatim debit' dicta
terra nomine feodifirme Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile
preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo presentauit in curia
tanquam secundo die huius processus Testibus Dauid tailyeour georgio
tailyeour et Willelmo scrimgeour sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vno dominus Johannes Chaer capellanus ac procurator
altaris sancti saluatoris infra ecclesiam sancti nicholaij de Abirdene situati et
protestatus fuit In forma Juris pro vno annuo Redditu octodecim solidorum monete
scocie sibi et dicto altarj a longo tempore debit' et non solit' de eodem terra
vasta Jacente infra dictum burgum extra portam borialem vicj castri inter
terram symonis gardin ex orientali ex vna et communionem viam regiam ex occidentali
Ad quam terram accedens nichil recepit distringibile preter terram et lapides
quos balliuis in sacculo presentavit in curia tanquam secundo die huius processus
Testibus

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus Johannes chamer procurator
altaris sancti saluatoris infra ecclesiam sanctj nicholaij de Abirdene' situati
et protestatus fuit In forma Juris pro vno annuo Redditu decim solidorum
vsualis monete scocie sibi et dicto altarj debit' et non solut' Ad quadam
terra vasta Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico nauium ex occidentali parte
euisdem vicj inter terram Johannis fechat ex occidentali ex vna et terram quondam Johannis
menyeis ex borealj partibus ab altera Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit
distringibile preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in sacculo presentavit in
curia tanquam secundo die huius processus Testibus vt supra

Eodem die accedens ad barram Johannes blak et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno
annuo redditu duarum marcarum monete scocie sibi debit' et non solut' de quadam terra vasta
Jacente in vico nauium ex orientali parte eiusdem vici inter terras gilberti Waus
many et thome prat versus oriens et boriam et communiones vias regias versus
occidens et Austrum Ad quam terram Accedens nichil repit distringibile preter terram et lapides
quos balliuis in Sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam primo die huius processus
Testibus Dauid talyour georgio talyeour et Willelmo scrimgeour seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretj virj magistri andreas p
Willelmus liell collectores capellanorum collegij ecclesie cathedralis
Abirdonensis et protestati fuerunt in forma Juris pro vno annuo reddit redditu xxiij
s' et quatuor denariorum dictis capellanis annuatim debit' de quadam terra
vasta quondam Willelmi cryne Jacente in futj inter terram Willelmi buchan
ex australi et terram Johannis Wormot ex borealj Ad quam terram
accedentes nichil reparierunt distringibile preter terram et lapides quos
balliuis in sacculo presentarunt in curia tanquam secundo die huius processus
Testibus Johanne paterson' thoma straloche et Andrea nachtj seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram Willelmus Wormet procurator magistri
andree caidiow et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu sex
solidorum sibi annuatim debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente infra dictum
burgum in vico nauium ex occidentali parte eiusdem inter terram quondam
Willelmi Kymdy constabilarij de Abirdene' ex boreali et terram quondam
Richardj craufurd ex occidentali in defectu solucionis dicti annuj Redditus
Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram
et lapides quos balliuis in sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam
secundo die huius processus Testibus Willelmo Rolland Alexandro
hay et gilberto preston seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram thomas Chapman et protestabatur in forma Juris
pro vno annuo Redditu vigintj solidorum vsualis monete scocie sibi animatum
debit' de terra quondam Andree smitht Jacente infra dictum burgum in
vico de le gastraw inter terram Johannis loremar ex orientali ex vna et
communiones vias regias ex occidentali et australi partibus Ad quam
terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides
quos balliuis in sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam secundo die
huius processus Testibus

Accedens ad barram dominus andreas chamer procurator ac collector capellarum de abirdene et protestatus
fuit pro vno annuo Redditu decim solidorum de terra quondam andree mureson' inter terram quondam nicholaij
mason' ex orientali et terram quondam Donaldj sclatar ex occidentali ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit
distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo presentavit in curia tanquam 2o die processus testibus
Dauid tailyiour georgio tailyour et Willelmo scrimgeour seriando

Accedens ad barram dominus andreas chamer procurator capellanorum de abirdene et protestabat
in forma Iuris pro vno annuo Redditu iiijor s' de terra quondam Willelmi spens alias litstar
in vico superiore ecclesie inter terram quondam Willelmi scherar ec occidentali et terram quondam Johannis stokar
ex orientali ad quam terram acceden accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo
presentavit curia tanquam 2o die processus testibus ut supra
